item.title: I need a drop ore procedure please
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

[code]Procedure LoadBitmaps;
Begin
Procedure LoadBitmaps;
Begin
Clay := BitmapFromString(4, 4, ‘86714C89734D8B7650907A52978’ +
‘1569781569A8357957E55A1895CA38B5D9F875B9C8559AC9262A8’ +
‘8F60A58D5FA1895C’);

OreMask := BitmapFromString(11, 11, ‘z78DA73730301033070436’ +
‘2238B60024C35B84CC0A5923C13F0BB937813F0EB22DE04CC5022’ +
‘CF04CADD404CC890EA0BFCE2F85D4E4C6A212FF470998FCC0600F’ +
‘B599CC1’);
End;

Procedure DropOres;
Begin
ClickAllItemsBmpMaskTolWait(‘rop’, OreMask, 20, 25, 30+Random(30));
ClickAllItemsBmpTolWait(‘rop’, Clay, 10, 30+Random(30));
End;[/code]

The dropping procedure and the bitmap masks are taken from Wizzup?'s SRL Powerminer, please, PLEASE, give credits if you use them.

EDIT: You could use Juniors, too. This drops only the ores, though.

item.title: I need a drop ore procedure please
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

to drop stuff in your inven try this:
[scar]dropto(1,28);[/scar]
That will drop from 1st inventory slot to the last.
If your not weilding the pick try this:
[scar]dropto(2,28);[/scar]

EDIT: The second one will drop from the 2nd to last… Just to let you know
~jR
